name: Manager
text: Did you find everything you--^5 uh.

name: Manager
text: So I take it.^5.^5.^5you like Slurpees?

name: Adam
text: I.^9 LOVE.^9 Slurpees.^9 You have no idea.

name: Manager
text: Where did you even find the time to grab that many Slurpees?^9 You walked from the door straight to here.

name: Adam
text: Some questions are better left unanswered.^9 Bye!
